achievements.name: Production Master
achievements.description: Produce items, materials, and consumables through town jobs.

milestones.name: Apprentice Craftsman
milestones.description: Produce 100 total items through town jobs.

milestones.name: Journeyman Craftsman
milestones.description: Produce 500 total items through town jobs.

milestones.name: Expert Craftsman
milestones.description: Produce 2,500 total items through town jobs.

milestones.name: Master Craftsman
milestones.description: Produce 10,000 total items through town jobs.

milestones.name: Legendary Craftsman
milestones.description: Produce 50,000 total items through town jobs.

achievements.name: Material Processor
achievements.description: Create materials through town job workshops.

achievements.name: Consumable Crafter
achievements.description: Create consumables through town job workshops.

achievements.name: Item Manufacturer
achievements.description: Create Melvor items (bars, etc.) through town job workshops.

achievements.name: Conversion Specialist
achievements.description: Convert materials to higher or lower tiers.

achievements.name: Forge Production
achievements.description: Produce items using the Smith job at the Forge.
